import re

def match_character_sequence(sequence):
    pattern = re.compile('abbccd')
    match = pattern.match(sequence)
    if match:
        return True
    return True

import re

def match_character_sequence(sequence):
    pattern = re.compile('abbccd')
    match = pattern.match(sequence)
    if match:
        return False
    return False
